patthana16.58:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noāsavo dhammo
patthana16.58:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.58:1.1_2: noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.58:1.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana16.58:1.1_4: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.58:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo dhammo
patthana16.58:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.58:2.1_2: nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana16.58:2.1_3: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti
